text.*:
Countries listed as having a flag of convenience by the ITF.

The International Transport Workers' Federation maintains a list of countries it considers to be flag of convenience in regard to ship registration. There are currently 35 registries on the list.[1]

Contents

  • 1 Criteria
  • 2 Flag States
  • 3 See also
  • 4 Notes

Criteria[edit]

In developing the list, the ITF considers "ability and willingness of the flag state to enforce international minimum social standards on its vessels,"[2] the "degree of ratification and enforcement of ILO Conventions and Recommendations,"[2] and "safety and environmental record."[2] The following registries are on the ITF list (with figures sourced from the CIA World Factbook):
